title: Make APK Extractor icon material
body: This patch provides a new icon fitting Google Material guidelines. I also suggest using 96 dpi resolution.

title: Add Russian translation.
body:
This patch mainly contains Russian localization, though several small things were fixed along the way:
* Target SDK, Android libs versions
* Application colors (stepped away from default blue:pink ones)
* Info message delay showing extracted APK location was increased a bit for convenience

title: I created a Norwegian Bokmål translation
body: Feel free to tell me if there's anything wrong with it, or if it's good enough to be accepted.

title: Extracted apk file from apk extractor app not working
body:
#### Expected behavior After extracting the apk file, I expected when the raw the file is clicked it should show the app asking if I want to install it as an update or asking permission to install #### Actual behavior The extracted apk is showing file format not supported when clicked #### How to reproduce - download the app [here](https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdid=axp.tool.apkextractor) - click on any app to extract their apk file - go-to the file location of the extracted apk file mostly in downloads - click on the extracted apk file File format not supported! * Mobile: Infinix note 4 * Operating system: android 7.0 * version: 1.4 #### Recording Of The Bug https://youtu.be/68CQDRHjPh8
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

title: Fix fastlane metadata and add German translation
Updated de (German) translation
body:
I have translated your application into `de` (*German*). Here is the xml:
```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
	tools:ignore="MissingTranslation">

	<string name="app_name">Apk Extraktor</string>
	<string name="hello_world">Hello world!</string>
	<string name="dlg_loading_title">Lade</string>
	<string name="dlg_loading_body">Lade Liste mit installierten Apps...</string>
	<string name="msg_search">Suche</string>
	<string name="msg_search_help">Suche per App- oder Paketname</string>
	<string name="toast_extracted">APK-Datei wurde nach %s gespeichert</string>
	<string name="toast_failed">Extraktion fehlgeschlagen. Siehe ADB Log für weitere Details.</string>
	<string name="alert_root_title">Als root versucht?</string>
	<string name="alert_root_body">Es sieht aus als könne diese App nicht auf normalem Weg extrahiert werden. Dies ist normal für bezahlte Apps: Android versucht das Kopieren zu verhindern. Auf gerooteten Geräten können diese Apps dennoch extrahiert werden. Ist dein Gerät gerootet kann apkExtractor versuchen diese Apps als root zu extrahieren.</string>
	<string name="alert_root_yes">Versuche es als root</string>
	<string name="alert_root_no">Nicht jetzt</string>
	<string name="alert_perm_title">Berechtigung benötigt</string>
	<string name="alert_perm_body">Um eine apk datei zu erstellen, muss die App die \"Speicher\" Berechtigung haben.\n
  \n
  Bitte, öffne die App-Einstellungen und erteile die \"Speicher\"-Berechtigung.</string>
	<string name="alert_perm_btn">Einstellungen öffnen</string>

</resources>

```

---

*Translation made with [Stringlate](https://github.com/LonamiWebs/Stringlate).*

title: reorder app list by name/date
body: Hi. As the title suggests, I would like you to add an option to reorder apps list by name/date, in order to simplify the extraction, especially for newly installed apps

title: disable system app view
body: Hi. As the title suggests, I would like you to add an option to disable system apps view.. since they are usually not updated with the same frequency as those users

title: Scroll bar missing
body:
With the latest version 1.3 I cannot see any scroll bar on the right edge.
Android 7.1.2
Lineageos 14.1

title: FR: Metadata for fdroid
body:
When providing metadata via a fastlane directory, fdroid automaticly shows them in the store. You dont need to install fastlane, just create the folder

Example: https://github.com/Freeyourgadget/Gadgetbridge/tree/master/fastlane/metadata/android/en-US
Info: https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/2.28.7/supply/README.md#images-and-screenshots

title: FR: Adaptive icon
body: Android 8 introduced adaptive icons and I would like to see them here.

title: Backup with name
body: Modify the name of backup's APK adding name, version code and package name

title: Automatic backup
body: Add an automatic backup for new installed apps

title: Crashes on Motorola Defy (MB525)
body:
Hi,

apkExtractor crashes on Motorola Defy (MB525).

FYI : MB525 run on Android Froyo (2.2)

Can you try and fix this ?

title: Settings
body:
- Filename (Package-Name or App-Title)
- Destination-Folder
- License-Info
- Link to this Github-Repo

If i find some time, i will submit a pull request soon!

title: Call requires API level 8 (current min is 7): android.app.SearchManager#getSearchableInfo
